thread.section_title: Norwegian Air Shuttle omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Norwegian Air Shuttle | www.norwegian.com
thread.title: Belsø
thread.title_full: Norwegian Air Shuttle anmeldt av Belsø

author: Belsø
title: Belsø
text:
Norwegian's long haul fleet of new and modern Boeing Dreamliners are very comfortable and reasonably spacious for a budget airline. Onboard service is above what you've come to expect and most importantly the prices for non-stop cross Atlantic flights from Denmark are unmatched by any other airline.
I've travelled to and from US destinations with Norwegian a number of times and only once experienced a delay. Upon filing for claim because if the delay I received a positive response within a couple of days.
I will definitely travel with Norwegian again in the future.
